author: Bob Dein
content:
I have CS4, and will wait for CS6. Or 7. Instead, I got NIK Silver Efex Pro - a VERY good move. I also have a D90. When I get better than the camera, I'll upgrade (not for a looong while). But it is reassuring to know that if I accidentally trash the D90, a VERY good replacement is available.

Good luck to your rationalization process.  ðŸ™‚

Bob
